description: A TCNEncoder takes as input a sequence of vectors and returns asingle vector, which is the last one time step in the feature map.The input to this encoder is of shape (batch_size, num_tokens, input_size),and the output is of shape (batch_size, num_channels[-1]) with a receptivefiled:

params.name: input_size
params.description: The number of expected features in the input (the last dimension).

params.name: num_channels
params.description: The number of channels in different layer.
